oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Highly Successful Women Administrators: The Inside Story of How They Got There: Sandra Lee Gupton & Gloria Appelt Slick
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Griffith, Kimberly
Thompson, Janice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We are encouraged to acknowledge the fact that gender-related problems will face us as we pursue educational administrative careers.Our family, friends, and professional peers can provide the wisdom and support we need to lead with excellence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Education Leadership Research Center, Texas A&M University
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Advancing Women in Leadership Journal; Vol. 1, No. 2 = No. 2 (1998 Winter)
